Package com.coveros.training.library

Class LibraryUtils

java.lang.Object
com.coveros.training.library.LibraryUtils
public class LibraryUtils extends Object
Business logic for handling library needs. For example, lendBook(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.sql.Date)

  • Method Details

    • lendBook

      public LibraryActionResults lendBook(String bookTitle, String borrowerName, Date borrowDate)
      Lend a book to a borrower.
      Parameters:
      bookTitle - The title of a registered book, e.g. see registerBook(String)
      borrowerName - the name of a registered borrower, e.g. see registerBorrower(String)
      borrowDate - the date the book is being lent out.
      Returns:
      an enum LibraryActionResults indicating the resultant status

    • lendBook

      public LibraryActionResults lendBook(Book book, Borrower borrower, Date borrowDate)

    • registerBorrower

      public LibraryActionResults registerBorrower(String borrower)
      Register a borrower with the library
      Parameters:
      borrower - the name of a borrower
      Returns:
      an enum, LibraryActionResults indicating the resultant status

    • registerBook

      public LibraryActionResults registerBook(String bookTitle)
      Register a new book with the library
      Parameters:
      bookTitle - the title of a book
      Returns:
      an enum LibraryActionResults indicating the resultant status
